summary: The bill, titled the Giving Reservists A Valiant Eternity Act (GRAVE Act), aims to amend U.S. Code Title 38 to expand eligibility for headstones or grave markers from the Department of Veterans Affairs. This expansion would include certain members or former members of a Reserve of an Armed Force who may not otherwise qualify as veterans based on active-duty service requirements. The legislation provides for those who served in the reserve a right typically afforded to veterans.
